While in their [[Lightning Release Chakra Mode]], the user runs towards the opponent and punches them at maximum speed.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 544, pages 12-14</ref> 

== Trivia ==
* As with many of the techniques of [[Kumogakure]] [[shinobi]], this technique has an English name given kanji that somewhat match the pronunciation.
* Though A referred to this as just his "fastest punch" in the manga, this technique is given an explicit name in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]''.
* The only two shinobi to have ever dodged it are [[Minato Namikaze]] with his [[Flying Thunder God Technique]],<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 542, page 14</ref> and [[Naruto Uzumaki]] while in [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 544, pages 11-13</ref>
